channel.title: Forums
channel.description: Slight error with the forums. The guests can use /admin_???.php to gain access to my admin zone. I've looked at my database i can't seem to see the problem. People have said it's to do with the user group well no shit.. Anybody know the exact fix?

item.title: Forums
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

cheers m8, glad to help

Read full topic

item.title: Forums
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

Mother fucker… I knew it… I didn’t bother checking it, it should of been the first thing or one of em i checked… Their has to be an acoount with the ID of 1… And it’s normally always the TEST one. It had admin power.s. i changed to group id 3… Member… And it worked. Thanks for that mate i really do appreaciate.

I don’t often rep but here you are.

Read full topic

item.title: Forums
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

did you look in your “users” catagorie in your sql?

the user name “guest” or whatever user name that has a ‘id’ of 1 should have a ‘group id’ of 3

Read full topic

item.title: Forums
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

Hm, The “‘o_default_user_group’ => ‘4’,”, Is that what you ment by changing in the cache config? it was set at 4 not one… I set to 3 like you said.

Read full topic

item.title: Forums
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

You have not looked in the database.

Goto your users and make the group id for guest 3, it at 1 right now.

If that dosent work, goto your catch config in your phpfiles and change the default rank of a guest.

Read full topic
